#Data transformation: for every row
#possible parameters: 
#dataTrans:noTrans=1
#dataTrans:logTrans=1,e
#dataTrans:zScoreTrans=1
#dataTrans:minMaxTrans=1
#dataTrans:coxBox=1 Need to compelete

#Cluster
#possible parameters: row/col/both/null
cluster:generalClusterOption=both
cluster:hierarchicalCluster=1
cluster:hierarchicalCluster:keepOriginalOrder=1
#possible parameters: average dot product/pearson correlation/euclidean distance/manhattan distance/spearman rank correlation
cluster:hierarchicalCluster:distMetric=euclidean distance
#possible:
cluster:hierarchicalCluster:linkageMethod=Average linkage clustering
# k means and k meadians don't forget
#
cluster:line:color=0,0,0
cluster:line:width=2

#display
#possible: Original / Present /No value
display:dataValue:status=No value
display:dataValue:color=0,0,0
#possible: less than 4
display:dataValue:numOfdecimals=2
display:dataValue:font=Arial,0,12

display:border=1
display:border:color=190,190,190

display:legend=1
display:legend:width=30
display:legend:height=300

display:rowNames=1
display:rowNames:font=Arial,0,15
display:rowNames:roation=0
display:colNames=1
display:colNames:font=Arial,0,15
display:colNames:roation=90

display:annotation:font=Arial,0,16
display:rowAnnotation=1
#1 simple or 2 complex
display:rowAnnotation:input=RowAnno1#11111122223333333333
display:rowAnnotation:input=GeneClass#11111122223333333333#255,146,137|21,219,152|255,138,255#Path1|Path2|Path3
display:rowAnnotationSize=3
display:colAnnotation=1
#1 simple or 2 complex
#display:colAnnotation:input=ColAnno1#1111122222
#display:colAnnotation:input=ColAnno2#1234512345
display:colAnnotation:input=CellType#1111122222#19,204,255|189,194,19#GM12878|Haila
display:colAnnotation:input=Time#1234512345#238,249,252|178,226,226|103,195,164|103,195,164|47,162,95#0h|2h|4h|6h|8h
display:colAnnotationSize=3


#green-black-red,blue-yellow-black,blue-white-red,deepblue-yelllow-red,white-red,customed scheme|Col,Col,Col|0,0.5,1|
#pheatmap default scheme
display:cell:colorScheme=pheatmap default scheme
#possible parameters:rectangle,ellipse
display:cells:shape=rectangle

#gap informations
horizontalGaps=5
veriticalGaps=10,14
#gapSize=3
